trackpad:PocketGalaxy.NAME: Pocket Galaxy
trackpad:PocketGalaxy.FLAVOR: A galaxy in the palm of your hand.
DESCRIPTIONS: Any time a card enters your discard pile, shuffle a random card into your draw pile. It costs #b1 less.

trackpad:WondrousWand.NAME: Wondrous Wand
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw an extra card at the start of combat. It costs #b0 this turn.

trackpad:DisasterInABottle.NAME: Disaster in a Bottle
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose a card. When you play that card, deal #b10 damage to ALL enemies.
Choose a card for
will deal #b10 damage to ALL enemies when played.

trackpad:VoidSphere.NAME: Void Sphere
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, give all cards in your draw pile #yEthereal.

trackpad:ZombieHeart.NAME: Zombie Heart
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a non-minion enemy dies, gain #b1 Max HP, take #b1 damage.

trackpad:AdjectivePendant.NAME: Pendant
trackpad:AdjectivePendant.FLAVOR: It attunes to the user's will.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose an adjective. Adjectives give bonuses at the start of each combat.

trackpad:CultistFigurine.NAME: Cultist Figurine
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b1 #yStrength every #b3 turns.

trackpad:Compendium.NAME: Compendium
trackpad:Compendium.FLAVOR: How to win the game in 3 easy steps.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add a random Rare card to your draw pile. It costs #b1 less.

trackpad:PetRock.NAME: Pet Rock
trackpad:PetRock.FLAVOR: Remember to feed your pet rock once every 6 hours.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, deal #b5 damage to the enemy with the least HP.

trackpad:WindUpAutoDealer.NAME: Wind-Up Auto-Dealer
DESCRIPTIONS: Right Click to gain a charge. At the start of each turn, if this relic has charges, lose a charge and draw a card.

trackpad:Mousetrap.NAME: Mousetrap
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you get attacked each combat, deal #b15 damage to the attacker.

trackpad:GuardianSpirit.NAME: Guardian Spirit
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, fill your potion slots with Fairy in a Bottle.

trackpad:HandOfMidas.NAME: Hand of Midas
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you attack a non-elite non-boss enemy, there is a #b5% chance that you gain #yGold equal to their HP and instantly kill them.

trackpad:SappingStone.NAME: Sapping Stone
trackpad:SappingStone.FLAVOR: Saps away the strength of others.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, ALL enemies lose #b3 #yStrength until the end of their turn.

trackpad:SneckoScepter.NAME: Snecko Scepter
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a card that costs #b3 or more, its cost is randomized.

trackpad:ByrdCharm.NAME: Byrd Charm
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #b1 #yFlight.

trackpad:ToughGloves.NAME: Tough Gloves
trackpad:ToughGloves.FLAVOR: Guaranteed to protect you from thorns, or your money back.
DESCRIPTIONS: Take no thorns type damage from enemies.

trackpad:BottledTsunami.NAME: Bottled Tsunami
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose a card. When you play that card, add #b2 copies with #yEthereal and #yExhaust to your hand.
Choose a card for
will add #b2 copies of itself with #yEthereal and #yExhaust to your hand when drawn.

trackpad:RapidFire.NAME: Rapid Fire
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you deal damage to an enemy, increase it by #b2.

trackpad:BottledShadow.NAME: Bottled Shadow
trackpad:BottledShadow.FLAVOR: How do you bottle a lack of photons in the visible light spectrum?
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose a card. When you play that card, it is played an additional time.
Choose a card for
will be played an additional time.

trackpad:WritersBlock.NAME: Writer's Block
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, if you have not played a skill this turn, gain #b6 Block.

trackpad:NeutrinoGenerator.NAME: Neutrino Generator
trackpad:NeutrinoGenerator.FLAVOR: Has a known side effect of being hard to pronounce.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you spend #b2 or more energy on a card, #yChannel a random Orb.

trackpad:StainlessSteel.NAME: Stainless Steel
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you gain #yBlock #b3 times in a single turn, gain #b5 #yBlock.

trackpad:ChainingVapors.NAME: Chaining Vapors
trackpad:ChainingVapors.FLAVOR: How a chain of poison gas is made is a mystery.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you've already drawn #b4 cards this turn (Excluding your initial hand), whenever you draw a card, apply #b1 #yPoison to a random enemy.

trackpad:WeightlessShivs.NAME: Weightless Weaponry
trackpad:WeightlessShivs.FLAVOR: Have you ever seen an anti-gravity knife?
DESCRIPTIONS: Your #yShivs now #yRetain.

trackpad:AncestralArmaments.NAME: Ancestral Armaments
trackpad:AncestralArmaments.FLAVOR: The armaments are actually made of knives.
DESCRIPTIONS: #yShivs are now upgraded when created. #yShivs can be upgraded any number of times.

trackpad:IciclePrecepts.NAME: Icicle Precepts
trackpad:IciclePrecepts.FLAVOR: Rule #142: Icicles can be used as a stabbing weapon for self defence.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yChannel a #yFrost orb, gain 1 #yThorns. Whenever you #yEvoke or remove a #yFrost orb, lose 1 #yThorns.

trackpad:FocusingLens.NAME: Focusing Lens
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you attack an enemy, all #yLightning orbs will target that enemy for the rest of the turn.

trackpad:BottledAnger.NAME: Bottled Anger
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, put all Angers from your deck into your hand. Can overfill your hand. Future card rewards have #b1 more card to choose from. The last card in future card rewards will always be an Anger.

trackpad:BerserkersDraught.NAME: Berserker's Draught
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play an attack, add a charge to this relic. Whenever you play a skill, remove all charges. At the start of each combat, gain 1 #yStrength for each charge on this relic.

trackpad:BiPhaseBiplane.NAME: Bi-phase Biplane
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, put a random non-Status non-Curse card from your #yExhaust pile to your hand. it gains #yPurge and #ytrackpad:Spectral [REMOVE_SPACE].

trackpad:MiracleGrow.NAME: Miracle Grow
DESCRIPTIONS: The passive of your #yDark Orbs trigger a number of times equal to what slot they're in.

trackpad:StolenKidneys.NAME: Stolen Kidneys
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, remove all Basic Strikes from your deck. At the start of each turn, draw a card until you draw a non-Basic card.

trackpad:DemonHeart.NAME: Demon Heart
trackpad:DemonHeart.FLAVOR: Side effects include uncontrollable urges for world domination.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, if you have #b3 or more attacks in hand, gain [E] [REMOVE_SPACE].

trackpad:RiggedDice.NAME: Rigged Dice
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #ydiscard a card, your next #yAttack this turn deals double damage.

trackpad:Trackpad.NAME: Trackpad
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. Every #b3 to #b5 seconds, this relic hijacks your cursor and moves it to a random nearby spot.

trackpad:Coffee.NAME: Coffee
trackpad:Coffee.FLAVOR: A quick caffeine boost that leaves you feeling a little de-energized later
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of each turn. Every #b3 turns, add a #yVoid to the top of your draw pile.

trackpad:IceCube.NAME: Ice Cube
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #b3 #yDexterity. At the end of the first #b3 turns of combat, lose #b1 #yDexterity.

trackpad:ByrdBGone.NAME: Byrd-B-Gone
trackpad:ByrdBGone.FLAVOR: These Byrd spikes seem a little situational
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you are attacked and don't lose health, gain 1 #yThorns.

trackpad:FieryHotPepper.NAME: Fiery Hot Pepper
trackpad:FieryHotPepper.FLAVOR: Consumption not recommended unless you're a fan of spontaneous combustion.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, shuffle #b2 #yBurns into your draw pile. Whenever you draw a #yBurn [REMOVE_SPACE], deal #b8 damage to ALL enemies and discard it.

trackpad:StarterRelic1.NAME: Spell Scribe's Scroll
trackpad:StarterRelic1.FLAVOR: Inscribed with an "S" it radiates arcane energies.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, you can choose 1 of 3 random cards to shuffle into your draw pile.

trackpad:StarterRelic2.NAME: Spell Scribe's Pen
trackpad:StarterRelic2.FLAVOR: A fountain pen that never runs out of ink. It aids in the creation of spells.
DESCRIPTIONS: Adds 1 Scribed Spell to your hand at the start of every odd turn. NL Scribed Spells are used for casting spells created with #yscribe:Spell_Effects and #yscribe:Spell_Modifiers.
